title: A Man Reflects On His Past (1958 Adventure) French Film by Willy Rozier with Jacques Bergerac

sources.title: A Man Reflects On His Past (1958 Adventure) French Film by Willy Rozier with Jacques Bergerac
sources.description:
In the summer, Monge, a French trapper, makes a living from smuggling. He catches stray horses in the United States and sells them in Canada. He has no permanent home. That summer, he found himself living with an Irish farming family somewhere in Saskatchewan. Hannah, the daughter of the house, falls in love with him, although she is already engaged to a certain Archer, the engaged man.

Original title: Un homme se penche sur son passé

Director: Willy Rozier
Writers: Maurice Constantin-Weyer, Willy Rozier
Stars: Jacques Bergerac, Barbara Rütting, Pierre Dudan
Genres: French cinema, Adventure, Drama
